snippet: Alarming new advances by Sunni extremists have finally forced Iraq’s prime minister to put the future of his country over his political disputes.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that alarming new military advances by Islamic State in Iraq and Syria have forced Iraqi Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki to put future of his country over his political disputes and order military support for Kurdish forces battling extremists; laments Iraq's political paralysis that has prevented selection of new prime minister who can unify Iraq seems unending.
lead_paragraph: Alarming new advances by Sunni extremists have finally forced Iraq’s prime minister to put the future of his country over his political disputes.

headline.main: The Extremist Threat to Iraq Grows
headline.print_headline: The Extremist Threat to Iraq Grows

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
